metadata.title: CVE-2017-14502 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - negligible
metadata.description:
read_header in archive_read_support_format_rar.c in libarchive 3.3.2suffers from an off-by-one error for UTF-16 names in RAR archives, leadingto an out-of-bounds read in archive_read_format_rar_read_header.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-14502` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

bsdcpio - 3.1.2-7ubuntu2.7
bsdtar - 3.1.2-7ubuntu2.7
libarchive13 - 3.1.2-7ubuntu2.7
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libarchive package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.1.2-7ubuntu2.7').
